1142.content:
One day, you are chasing the dangerous alien criminal known as “Mary” through a darkened alley when suddenly, you turn a corner into a dead end. However, Mary is nowhere to be found. A voice from behind you causes you to spin around on your heels.

“You’ve been quite persistent, agent. But I’ll never allow you to turn me over to your pathetic institute!” Mary says, before lunging at you. A sharp pain in your neck indicates that she’s injected you with some mysterious substance. As you stumble backwards, you notice that everything seems to be getting larger. It was some kind of shrinking potion! All of your elite training from the Torchwood Institute could never have prepared you for this. Mary’s boots now tower over you. Far above, her smirking face taunts you. Before you can turn to run, you slam headlong into a wall of flesh. Mary’s hand closes around you, enveloping you in warm skin.

“I could crush you right now, and end your pathetic life this instant, agent. But… I have something even more evil in mind for you,” she cackles, before your vision goes dark as Mary roughly shoves you into one of her jacket pockets.

All you can hear from your pocket prison is a cacophony of loud noises and what sounds like voices. After a while, the noise dies down as Mary’s hand reappears and wraps around you. You squint as you are suddenly thrust into the light. It seems like you are now in some kind of residence, with Mary’s smirking face appearing once again. “Simply killing you would be too easy,” she cackles. “I’ll make sure you suffer first.” Mary’s fingers suddenly release, and you let out a very-unmanly scream as you fall through open air. Your arms flail wildly as you splash down into some kind of liquid. Swimming to the surface, you realize that the strong-smelling liquid that is currently ruining your leather jacket is, in fact, wine, and the curved walls rising all around you indicate that you’re floating around inside a wine glass. If Mary is planning on swallowing you, then you plan on giving her one hell of an upset stomach.

The wine ocean around you splashes about as Mary hands the glass to someone else. Looking up, you are flabbergasted to see the face of your fellow agent, Toshiko Sato! Sure, you’ve only passed each other in the hallways, but she should still recognize you!

“Hey! Tosh! It’s me!” you cry out, but her eyes are trained solely on her lover and your shouts go unheard. Your glass begins to tilt as Tosh brings it to her lovely red lips, which part to reveal the gleaming teeth within. You quickly pass under her nose, as the raging current drags you between her lips. Her sharp teeth barely pass over your head as you are fully brought into her mouth. Waves of wine slosh around the red cavern, crashing against the walls of her shining white teeth as you try to keep your head above the tide. The leviathan of her tongue bursts forth from beneath you, pinning you to the roof of her mouth as she swallows the wine with a deafening roar. Just as your bones are about to snap, the pressure releases and you are lowered back down.

Tosh’s lips part just enough to let some light into the organic cavern, and you take a look around while you catch your breath. Small bits of a previous meal are stuck between her otherwise-perfect teeth, which are the size of boulders to you and could easily grind you to powder. Behind you, Tosh’s pink uvula dangles over a gaping precipice. Her massive tongue twitches beneath you, and you can feel her tastebuds even through your tight-fitting jeans. Certainly, your expertly-trained mind can figure a way out of even this situation. After all, you once destroyed a Dalek with nothing more than a pair of pliers and a wad of gum. However, the damp air stank of wine and it was making you more than a little dizzy.

Staring through Tosh’s parted lips to the world outside, you are alarmed to see Mary’s grinning face appear. She licks her lips hungrily before engaging Tosh in a deep kiss. Your eardrums pop as the pressure in Tosh’s mouth increases dramatically as her lips seal shut against her lover’s. Just before your head shatters, Mary’s tongue bursts forth from between Tosh’s lips and writhes around before the tip smashes headlong into you. Tosh’s own tongue rises to meet the challenger, and you are squashed between the two lovers’ tongues as they kiss. Mary’s tongue seems to take a keen interest in you, as if she’s still taunting you. Lifting you up by the tip of her tongue, Mary’s tongue pulls you along the inside of Tosh’s cheeks, along the ridged roof of her mouth, and finally drags you along her sharp teeth, which leaves you bloody and battered. The two tongues collide once more with the power of two freight trains colliding, with you plum in the center. You are on the verge of passing out when finally, Mary’s tongue ceases its torture and returns to its owner’s mouth.

Sprawled out on Tosh’s warm tongue, you are trying to think of some way out of this mess when the lips part once more and present you with a most dreaded sight: another glass of wine. Red waves flood the humid cavern once more, and this time, you are powerless to fight against the current. The wine picks you up and carries you to the back of Tosh’s throat. You try to execute a secret agent move and attempt to grab her meaty uvula, but your endeavor falls short and you are drawn into your fellow agent’s esophagus, where her strong throat muscles easily push you down, despite your futile attempts to crawl back up.

Eventually, your bruised and battered body lands with a plop in a rather foul-smelling chamber. Whipping out your trusty indestructible pen light, you shine it around and realize that you are now in Tosh’s stomach, well beyond any hope of rescue. Thankfully, your bio-resistant (and stylish) standard-issue agent garments will give you some protection from her stomach acid. Your light glints off something in the corner of her stomach…
